name: Onmiroji
description:
Onmiroji
 is a runner game following an exorcist fighting spirits who've stolen all the color along the countryside. Using the power of strewn paint and a holy paintbrush, mix and match colors to exorcise the different spirits and restore color to the once lush landscapes.

Player
In a world where Yokai dominates the land of Japan, the Onmiroji's sole purpose is to exorcise said Yokai and help his people. With his divine power, guide him to defeat the Yokai and make him prevail. Enemies
These are the enemies you have to defeat to progress. They each have corresponding colors that the player needs to have to defeat them. Barrel
The colored barrels in the game let you change your current paint. There are barrels that the player needs to get and mix in order to defeat the colored enemies.

                                                                                          Color IndicatorThis icon shows the current color of the character. It will change depending on what colored barrel the player touches.

                                                                      

Controls
A and D keys are the only movement for direction.

                                                                                                                   Obstacles
Different types of blocks you have to avoid to proceed.


Submitted to GameJam+ Manila 2021

Developed by Team 404 (bob)

Back-end Team 

Aton Alwin A. David - Programmer

Izak Kyle E. Villanueva - Programmer
